name: NicoNotes The Whoo!
description:
A family friendly musical puzzle game where kids of all ages use skill and strategy to help the magical musical NicoNotes fly back into their nests, avoiding bad characters and solving challenges along the way.

Hi Whistlers!

Just wanted to update you all on the features and fun things you can do with the family friendly NicoNotes - The Whoo! game for all to enjoy.

  • All the levels have different themes and present new challenges with different degrees of difficulty. Can you get through them all ?
  • Challenge your friends and others to be the top of the Leaderboards. Each Grove has its own Leaderboard and there is one overall Top Leaderboard. Who will be #1?

Here are some of the Key Features:

  • Explore - Unlocking the first 5 levels will unlock the next Grove.
  • Collect hidden treasures - Treasures are scattered throughout the levels, find a set of 3 and you unlock a bonus level!
  • Bonus Levels - The bonus levels are fun places to go, some have mini games and other creative aspects
  • Danger Traps - Solve the puzzles while avoiding danger traps like Xylogators and flying Musical Bats
  • Professor Fippy Music Levels - Unlock these levels by playing the main Intro Grove. Professor Fippy has musical activities for you to enjoy!
